## SingleLineTextFieldDefinition type

Represents a single-line text field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SingleLineTextFieldDefinition = TextFieldDefinition & {
    DefaultValue?: string;
    List?: SingleLineTextListDefinition;
    MaxLength?: number;
    MinLength?: number;
    Pattern?: string;
};
```
